title: About Us Paragraph
text:
Wine:30 on Oak St. in the heart of down town Roanoke Texas. A place to gather with friends or just come in to relax and enjoy an excellent glass of wine. We are your neighborhood.
Cheers!

 Offering wine by the glass, bottle or flight tasting in house as well as by the bottle to enjoy at home.

 A great place to hold private parties, meetings and work events. Wine:30 offers a private room available to rent for small parties and meetings. Should the party or group require more space, arrangements can be made to rent out the entire bar for your event. Give us a call or stop in and lets talk about your needs and what we have to offer.
